trait.name: Equipment
trait.text: A set of fine clothes, house signet ring, identification papers, and a purse containing 20 gp.

trait.name: Role
trait.text: You always gather information for your house, but when a baron give you a specific mission, what sort of work do you do? The House Agent Role table gives possibilities.

trait.name: Feature: House Connections
trait.text: As an agent of your house, you can always get food and lodging for yourself and your friends at a house enclave. When the house assigns you a mission, it will usually provide you with the necessary supplies and transportation. Beyond this, you have many old friends, mentors, and rivals in your house, and you may encounter one of them when you interact with a house business. The degree to which such acquaintances are willing to help you depends on your current standing in your house.
